entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy changing to periods of light snow this evening. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
